generalDescription: I enjoy challenges and learning new technologies. I like working in a team, helping my teammates, and solving problems together. I also like to lead projects and collaborate to create great results. I am always looking for ways to grow, improve my skills, and contribute to the success of the team
professionalObjective: I am looking for a position where I can grow and learn new technologies. I want to work in a team where I can contribute to the success of the project and the company. education.title: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science
education.name: Instituto Industrial Huergo
education.description: I studied computer science at the Instituto Industrial Huergo. I learned about algorithms, data structures, software engineering, and computer architecture. I also learned about databases, networks, and operating systems. I worked on several projects, including a web application, a mobile app, and a game. I graduated with a Bachelor of Science in Computer Science.

experience.title: Full-Stack Intership
experience.name: GM2Dev
experience.description: I worked as a full-stack developer intern. I worked on a project that involved creating a web application using React, Node.js, and SQLite. I also worked on the backend, creating RESTful APIs and integrating them with the frontend. I learned a lot about web development and gained valuable experience working in a team.
